#text=I went to the local library in my town yesterday .
#text=I was dying to read the new book by James Patterson .
#text=I was n't sure where to find the mystery section in the library so I asked the librarian .
#text=She entered the book information into the computer and then told me where I could find the book .
#text=As it turned out , the mystery section was clearly labeled , as were the books .
#text=They were in alphabetical order by author .
#text=I found the P section and located books by Patterson .
#text=It was easy to find my book .
#text=I took the book up to the checkout desk .
#text=The librarian asked for my library card .
#text=A library card has my name on it and a computer code on it .
#text=The librarian swiped my card and told me that my book was due back in two weeks .
#text=She told me that she hoped I enjoyed the book .
